AboutPage.title: Miel Ayed: Authenticity Above All
AboutPage.intro: Ideal for a modern and clean design
AboutPage.story_desc: At Miel Ayed, we are proud to be more than just sellers: we are breeders and producers. Founded by Abd El Hedi Ayed, our brand was born from a simple desire: to offer honey of exceptional purity, just as it comes from the hive.
AboutPage.gallery_subtitle: Discover our journey through different landscapes and cultures
AboutPage.artisanal_production_desc: All our honey is harvested from our own beekeeping farm. We know our hives and we respect their natural cycle.
AboutPage.additives_free_desc: We fight against adulterated honey. Our products are guaranteed without any added sugar, syrup or coloring.
AboutPage.passionate_expertise_desc: Guided by the expertise of Abd El Hedi Ayed, a great admirer of the beekeeping world, we prioritize quality over quantity.
AboutPage.taste_difference: Taste the difference of 100% natural honey
